tool_description: Detects and analyzes device capabilities including screen resolution, processing power, and supported codecs to optimize video streaming parameters.

user_agent_string.description: Browser or application user agent string

error_messages: Empty user agent: Provide a valid user agent string
Invalid screen dimensions: Screen width and height must be positive integers
Invalid connection speed: Use supported values (slow-2g, 2g, 3g, 4g, 5g, wifi)
Device detection failed: User agent string format not recognized
usage: Provide user agent string and optionally screen dimensions and connection speed. The tool analyzes device capabilities for streaming optimization.

device_category.description: Detected device category (mobile, tablet, desktop, tv, unknown)

max_supported_resolution.description: Maximum recommended video resolution for this device

supported_codecs.description: List of video codecs supported by the device

processing_capability_score.description: Device processing power score from 0.0 to 10.0

recommended_max_bitrate_kbps.description: Recommended maximum bitrate for optimal playback

supports_hardware_decoding.description: Whether device supports hardware video decoding
